info.name: Dark Minimalist Google - Background Variety
info.description: There's no good styles for google right now so I made one.
info.additionalInfo:
02/06/2019 - A few improvements

04/06/2019 - And a few more improvements

06/06/2019 - Added variety of background images

07/06/2019 - Daily images instead of every refresh

13/07/2019 - Optional theme setting. Choose the type of images you want for the background. Also more fixes.

15/01/2020 - Fixed Currency Conversions tab

19/01/2020 - Fixed more "widgets"
